channel.title: In My Opinion on Solidforest
channel.description: Recent content in In My Opinion on Solidforest

item.title: Thought About Music and Musicians
item.description: </p><p class="drop-cap">Sarah, who had to give up her dream of becoming a professional musician to live her dream of being an independent musician, has been dreaming of this dream for a long time, it all started when she was little, and she always wanted to play music but she always thought she couldn’t do it. She started to learn how to play instruments at the age of 7, and then she started to make music. After a while she found her passion in the field of music, but she couldn’t believe in herself. So, she decided to try and make her dreams come true.
